glsa.title: Setuptools: Man-in-the-Middle attack
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in Setuptools could allow remote attackers to perform man-in-the-middle attacks.

background.p: Setuptools is a manager for Python packages.

description.p: Setuptools does not check the integrity of downloaded Python packages.

impact.p: A remote attacker could perform man-in-the-middle attacks to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Setuptools users should upgrade to the latest version:
